resources.string: Our product i.e. (WIFI PASSWORD MASTER-SHOW ALL PASSWORD) asks user to grant certain permissions that are required for the app to perform its actions properly. As the application helps the user to scan wifi, internet speed uploading and downloading, generate password, show password etc. it needs special privileges. We ensure you that the users personal data or information is not collected by the company nor does the application host users data.
The application requires the user to agree certain permission and rules to access. This access is used by the application in the following ways:
1. The application requires CHANGE_WIFI permission to access different wifi available.
2. The application needs WRTIE_SETTING permission to write to wifi settings.
3. The application requires LOCATION permission to scan wifi in nearby area.
4. The application generates password with alpha-numeric combination to connect to wifi.
5. The application shows password and SSID of the connected wifi.
